welcome.title: Welcome to ZaoApp
welcome.summary: Zao App is your all-in-one farming companion, helping you connect, learn, trade, and grow with expert insights, AI-powered assistance, and a thriving agricultural community.

connect.title: Zao Connect – Grow Your Network, Share Your Knowledge!
connect.summary: Zao Connect is your dedicated space to network with fellow farmers, agribusinesses, and experts, sharing insights, experiences, and best practices.

learn.title: Zao Learn – Grow Your Knowledge, Master New Skills!
learn.summary: Unlock expert-led courses and practical farming knowledge. Learn about crop management, pest control, business skills, and sustainability through interactive videos, quizzes, and community discussions.

market.title: Zao Market – Buy, Sell & Trade with Ease!
market.summary: Your one-stop agricultural marketplace. Browse and purchase farm essentials like seeds, fertilizers, and equipment, or sell your produce and services to verified buyers.

insight.title: Zao Insight – Smart Farming, Smarter Decisions!
insight.summary: Get real-time agricultural intelligence at your fingertips. Access AI-powered crop recommendations, weather forecasts, and market price trends to optimize your farming decisions.

ai.title: Zao AI – Your Smart Farming Assistant!
ai.summary: AI-powered guidance for better farming. Diagnose crop diseases, receive tailored irrigation and fertilization advice, and get real-time market insights.
